Package net.jdazher.infrastructure.tasks.rest

Class TaskController

java.lang.Object
net.jdazher.infrastructure.tasks.rest.TaskController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/tasks") public class TaskController extends Object
REST controller for managing tasks.

This class provides endpoints for creating, updating, and retrieving tasks.

Endpoints include:

  • POST /tasks/create: Create a new task.
  • POST /tasks/create/all: Create multiple tasks.
  • PUT /tasks/update/{id}: Update the status of a task.
  • GET /tasks/get/{id}: Retrieve a task by its ID.
  • GET /tasks/get: Retrieve tasks by title.
  • GET /tasks/get/all: Retrieve all tasks.

      Creates a new task based on the provided request.
      Parameters:
      taskRequest - The request containing task details.
      Returns:
      A response entity containing the created task or an error message.
      Throws:
      IllegalDateException - If the provided due date is invalid.

      Parameters:

    • updateStatus

      Parameters:
